channel.title: I Need Either A Good Silab Coder OR! Where you need a 99 stat to get a skillcape
channel.description: Hey guys, I'm really in need a good silab coder or someone who can tell me the code to put onto the skillcapes. To where you need 99 in a skill to wear a skillcape. Thanks guys, much help apprieciated.

item.title: I Need Either A Good Silab Coder OR! Where you need a 99 stat to get a skillcape
item.dc:creator: @xtgscott xtgscott
item.description:
@xtgscott wrote:

Yeah, thanks guys. This topic is old and I already know how to do it lol. I’ve been learning how to code with Java so I pretty much know how to do the basic stuff.

Read full topic

item.title: I Need Either A Good Silab Coder OR! Where you need a 99 stat to get a skillcape
item.dc:creator: @glabay glabay
item.description:
@glabay wrote:

did u add like armor req to ur server if so just go to the bttom of the skill in which the cape is for and add in the 99 req

/* Level 99 Item's */
if(ItemID == [capeID]//cape name
|| ItemID == [foodID]//hood name
){
return 99;
}

if u don’t have the req’s on your armors and weapons by item id then u need another way

Read full topic

item.title: I Need Either A Good Silab Coder OR! Where you need a 99 stat to get a skillcape
item.dc:creator: @xtgscott xtgscott
item.description:
@xtgscott wrote:

Ok, thanks R4NDOM. I appreciate it man. Btw, when you said the * needs to be manipulated. What did you mean exactly? Oh and I tried what you said and I got an error. Good thing I got a backup copy of my server =p

Read full topic
item.source: I Need Either A Good Silab Coder OR! Where you need a 99 stat to get a skillcape

item.title: I Need Either A Good Silab Coder OR! Where you need a 99 stat to get a skillcape
item.dc:creator: @R4ND0M R4ND0M
item.description:
@R4ND0M wrote:

search for

public void levelup

in client.java. after each case (0, 1, 2, etc.), place this under the…

sendMessage("Congratulations, you just advanced an *skill* level.");

…

if (playerLevel[*case number*] == 99) { addItem(*itemID of cape corresponding to skill*, 1); }

NOTE: all the words in the asterisk symbols (*) are manipulated. you have to change them…

EDIT:

[quote=“xx qwertyuiop xx, post:2, topic:178912”]This’ll be the third time I’ve posted this.
How will it benefit the programmer?[/quote]

i know it might be a lot of times that you post some things, but even if you do, just repost it to be helpful…

Read full topic
item.source: I Need Either A Good Silab Coder OR! Where you need a 99 stat to get a skillcape
